cards.name: White Harbor Watchman
cards.text: Reaction: After a character comes out of shadows, sacrifice White Harbor Watchman to kill that character.
cards.flavor: "We are good people in White Harbor, lawful, loyal people." <cite>Leona Manderly</cite>

cards.name: Tower of the Hand
cards.text: Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose and stand a [stark] character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Alyce Graceford
cards.text: Action: Kneel Alyce Graceford to choose another The Seven character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown.
cards.flavor: Lady Graceford, who was large with child, asked the queen's leave to name it Tywin if it were a boy, or Lanna if it were a girl.

cards.name: The Maidenvault
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After The Maidenvault comes out of shadows, choose a participating Lady character. Stand it and remove it from the challenge. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Maidenvault to return it to shadows.

cards.name: Forest Patrol
cards.text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel a [thenightswatch] location to put Forest Patrol into play from shadows.

cards.name: Blackbird
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Blackbird comes out of shadows, choose and stand another [thenightswatch] location. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Castle Guard
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Castle Guard comes out of shadows, choose another character that came out of shadows this phase. Return that character to shadows.

cards.name: Public Execution
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose and kill a kneeling character.
cards.flavor: "A ruler who hides behind paid executioners soon forgets what death is." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>

cards.name: Doubting Septa
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, sacrifice Doubting Septa to choose a character or location you control. That card gains 1 power.

cards.name: Tunnels of the Red Keep
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Tunnels of the Red Keep to return it to shadows. Then, until the end of the phase, each character you control gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Gorold Goodbrother
cards.text: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After a location enters an opponent's discard pile, stand Gorold Goodbrother. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "What shall it be, homage or defiance?"

cards.name: Shadow of the Isles
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Each player chooses a non-limited location he or she controls and discards it from play. If there is a War plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Isles to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Shadowblack Assassin
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Shadowblack Assassin comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower.

cards.name: Dragon Skull
cards.text: [targaryen] character only. Shadow (2). While there are no Dragon characters in play, attached character gains intimidate and renown.

cards.name: Sarella Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Sarella Sand is attacking, you may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Unless she returns to Dorne, there's naught I can do about Sarella save pray that she shows more sense than her sisters." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>

cards.name: Meadowlark
cards.text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, place 1 journey token on Meadowlark. Action: Sacrifice Meadowlark to search your deck for a character with printed cost X or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. X is the number of journey tokens on Meadowlark.

cards.name: Advisor to the Crown
cards.text: Action: Kneel Advisor to the Crown to reduce the cost of the next Maester character you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: Knights of the Mind
cards.text: Challenge Action: Until the end of the phase, each Maester character you control gains a [military] icon.
cards.flavor: "There are some who call my order the knights of the mind." <cite>Maester Luwin</cite>

cards.name: Kingdom of Shadows
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal characters with the printed shadow keyword from any faction in your deck.
Increase the cost of each character you marshal by 1. Reduce the cost of the first character you bring out of shadows each round by 2.

cards.name: City of Spiders
cards.text: When Revealed: Initiate the when revealed ability of a City plot card in your used pile as if you had just revealed it.
